original_text: Then he will send his angels. They will go in every direction, to every part of the earth and to every part of the sky. They will bring together all the people that God has chosen.
korean_text: 또 그 때에 그가 천사들을 보내어 자기가 택하신 자들을 땅 끝으로부터 하늘 끝까지 사방에서 모으리라

sentences.original_text: Then he will send his angels.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자신의 천사들을 보낼 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will go in every direction
to every part of the earth
and to every part of the sky.
They will bring together all the people
